rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing entities corresponding to the names by which the practitioners of a given religion are known, e.g. Hindu for Hinduism, Christian for Christianity, and Roman Catholic for Roman Catholicism.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Adherents

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates the name by which the adherents of a given religion are known, e.g. Hindu, to the corresponding religion, e.g. Hinduism.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religion

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all religious beliefs. These are the concepts that adherents should hold true for a given religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Belief

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a religious belief to its corresponding religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Belief of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all Buddhist temples. These are the structures dedicated to Buddhist practice.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Buddhist Temple

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A local affiliate of a given religious organization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Congregation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a congregation to the number of members in the congregation.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number In Congregation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all deities. These are the sacred, holy, or divine beings of a given religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Deity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to its associated animal(s).
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Animal

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the mso:military.conflict(s) in which the deity was a participant.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Battle

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the deity's children. Note that the expected type of this property is mso:event.agent, because a deity can have both human and divine offspring.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Children

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the deity's associated color.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Color

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the deity's consort.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Consort

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to its associated mso:time.day_of_week.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Day of Week

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property relating a deity to its corresponding relation. Note that the expected type of this property needs to be changed from religion.deity to religion.religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Deity of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to associated festivals or holidays.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Festival

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the deity's home, which can be a real or fictional location.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Home

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a deity to an incarnation of the deity on Earth. Note that the expected type of this property is mso:biology.organism, because incarnations may not be limited to human forms.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Incarnation

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to its mantra, or sacred utterance.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Mantra

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to their known ride. Hera, for example, drives a chariot drawn by peacocks, while Ganesha uses mostly a mouse.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Mount

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the number associated with the deity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the deity's parents. Note that the expected type of this property is mso:event.agent, because a deity might have human and/or divine parents.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Parents

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to its associated mso:astronomy.planet.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Planet

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the mso:location.location that the deity was worshiped in or associated with.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Region

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property relating a deity to its corresponding religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religion

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the deity's siblings.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Siblings

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the text description of the deity's symbols.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Symbol

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to its associated religious texts, religion.religious_text.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Texts

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.deity to the weapon associated with the deity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Weapon

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing the beings, whether mythical or real, who are credited with founding a religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Founding Figure

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating a being to the religion that the being is credited with founding.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religion Founded

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all Hindu temples. These are the structures dedicated to Hindu worship practices.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Hindu Temple

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A building or complex of buildings where the members of a religious order live and practice their devotions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Monastery

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a monastery to its corresponding religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religion

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a monastery to its corresponding religious order.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Order

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A consecrated building where the practitioners of a religion gather to perform devotions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Place of Worship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a place of worship to a number indicating how many inscriptions are found in the place of worship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Inscriptions

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a place of worship to a number indicating how many monuments are found in the place of worship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Monuments

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a place of worship to a number indicating how many separate religious sites, e.g. temples, make up the place of worship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number of Worship Sites

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a place of worship to information about how the building has been used for religious purposes. Note that, despite the name, this property is appropriate for both current and historical uses of the structure.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Historical Use

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a place of worship to the religion that currently uses the building.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religion

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a place of worship to information about a person who played an official role at the place of worship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Officiant

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating a place of worship to a standard descriptor describing the type of building, e.g. basilica or shrine.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Type of Place of Worship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A relationship type collecting information about the historical and religious uses of a place of worship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Place of Worship Historical Use

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies a deity that was worshiped during the given historical use of the place of worship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Deity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property specifying the beginning date for a particular use of the place of worship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: From Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property specifying the given place of worship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Place of Worship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the primary deity that was worshiped during the given historical use of the place of worship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Primary Deity

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property specifying the religion that used the place of worship for the given time frame.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religion

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the religious jurisdiction that the place of worship was under during the given historical usage.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Jurisdiction

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property specifying the religious organization that used the place of worship for the given time frame.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property specifying the ending date for a particular use of the place of worship.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: To Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing entities for famous prayers, e.g. Hail Mary and the Lord's Prayer.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Prayer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all relics. Relics in this sense are the set of physical remains or personal effects of a saint or otherwise venerated person. Usually these pieces are preserved in some way as a memorial.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Relic

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.relic to its mso:location.location.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Location

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.relic to the text description of the relic. Relics can be body parts or other special items of the saint or venerated person.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Type

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all religions. Religions are the set of beliefs, cultural systems, and views put forth explaining the forces controlling human destiny.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religion

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property linking a religion to the entity corresponding to its adherents, e.g. the adherents of Hinduism are called Hindus, and the adherents of the Baptist Church are called Baptists.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Adherents

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property linking a religion to a standard descriptor for a belief or creed of the religion, e.g. monotheism, atheism, reincarnation, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Belief

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links an offshoot religion with its parent. This property is used when a group takes some elements of a particular religion and forms a new one. This property should be used when the offshoot represents a significant ideological split, and the adherents of the child religion no longer identify themselves as members of the parent religion, e.g. Christianity branched from Judaism. For denominations within a particular religion, the properties religion.religion.is_part_of and religion.religion.includes should be used.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Branched from

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religion with one of its offshoots. This property is used when a group takes some elements of a particular religion and forms a new one. This property should be used when the offshoot represents a significant ideological split, and the adherents of the child religion no longer identify themselves as members of the parent religion, e.g. Judaism branched into Christianity. For denominations within a particular religion, the properties religion.religion.is_part_of and religion.religion.includes should be used.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Branched into

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The sacred beings (such as gods or goddesses) revered by adherents of a religion. Examples: Shiva, Allah, The Three Pure Ones.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Deity Or Deities

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religion with a being, whether mythical or real, who is credited with founding the religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Founding Figures

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religion to a calendar day of particular significance to adherents of the religion, e.g. Christmas, Yom Kippur, Eid ul-Fitr, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Holidays

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religion to a particular denomination or school within the religion. Note that this property is used when the members of the child religion still consider themselves members of the parent religion, e.g. Christianity includes Mormonism. Otherwise, the properties religion.religion.branched_from and religion.religion.branched_into should be used.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Includes

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a particular denomination or school to its parent religion. Note that this property is used when the members of the child religion still consider themselves members of the parent religion, e.g. Mormonism is part of Christianity. Otherwise, the properties religion.religion.branched_from and religion.religion.branched_into should be used.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Is Part of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religion to individuals who were notable for the role they played in the development or practice of the religion, e.g. Mother Teresa and the Dalai Lama. Note that media celebrities who also happen to be adherents of a religion should not be included here. Examples:
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Notable Figures

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religion to the number of people who practice the religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Number Of Adherents

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religion to administrative bodies, charities, congregations, etc. associated with the religion, e.g. the Archdiocese of San Francisco, Bialystoker Synagogue, Foundation for the Preservation of the Mahayana Tradition, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a religion to a place of worship for the religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Places of Worship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a religion to information about how its places of worship were used historically for religious purposes.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Places of Worship Historical

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religion to a standard descriptor of a ritual or action regularly performed by adherents of the religion, e.g. prayer, meditation, ritual purification, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Practice

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religion to a place held to be holy by adherents of the religion, e.g. Jerusalem, Calvary, Itsukushima Shrine, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Sacred Sites

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religion to a core text or collection of texts associated with the religion, e.g. the Bible, the Qur'an, the Analects of Confucius, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Texts

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property relating a religion to a standard descriptor for the type of building used by the religion as a place of worship, e.g. basilica or shrine.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Type of Place of Worship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that contains standard descriptors for administrative divisions of a religion, e.g. parish, diocese, deanery, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Jurisdiction Class

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that relates a type of jurisdiction to a particular jurisdiction in the type, e.g. Deanery is related to Deanery of Castleisland and Archdiocese is related to Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Pesaro.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Jurisdiction

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that contains current and historical figures that have guided or directed the religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Leader

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a religious leader to information about their leadership, e.g. timeframe, title, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Leadership

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that contains particular administrative divisions of a religion, e.g. Episcopal Diocese of New Jersey and Episcopal Diocese of Massachusetts.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Jurisdiction

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a religious jurisdiction to information about leaders of the religious jurisdiction.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Leader

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religious jurisdiction to an organization that operates or defines the jurisdiction.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religious jurisdiction to the corresponding type of jurisdiction, e.g. Archdiocese, Vicarage, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Jurisdiction Class

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religious jurisdiction to the title associated with leaders of the jurisdiction. Note that the expected type of this property should eventually be changed to religion.religious_leadership_title.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Title
Religious Title Jurisdiction
rdf:Description.mso:type.type.deprecation_info: This type is not needed. Use religion.religious_organization_leadership instead. DeprecatedBy:[REDMOND\ianiles] Successor:[mso:religion.religious_organization_leadership]

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date the appointment began
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: From

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The title given to the religious leader appointed to this jurisdiction
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Leadership title

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: The date the appointment ended
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: To

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that contains standard descriptors for kinds of religious leadership titles, e.g. bishop, archbishop, deacon, archdeacon, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Leadership Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a type of religious leadership title to a religion that uses this type of title, e.g. Bishop is linked to Roman Catholicism.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religion

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a type of religious leadership title to an instance of that type of title, e.g. Bishop is linked to Bishop of Woolwich and Archbishop is linked to Archbishop of Wales.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Titles

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that contains specific titles of religious leaders, e.g. Roman Catholic Archbishop of Armagh and Roman Catholic Bishop of Gibraltar.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Leadership Title

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a specific title of a religious leader to the religious jurisdiction corresponding to this title. Note that the expected type of this property should eventually be changed to religion.religious_leadership_jurisdiction.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Jurisdictions

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a specific religious leadership title to information about religious leaders who have held the title.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Leaders

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that relates a specific religious leadership title to the rank or role corresponding to the title, e.g. Dean of Carlisle is related to Dean and Archbishop of Canterbury is related to Archbishop.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A religious organization whose aim is to convert others to the religion that the organization represents.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Mission

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type that collects information about the people who serve official functions in a place of worship, e.g.ministers, priests, assistants, musical directors, organists, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Officiant Tenure

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the end date of the tenure of the religious officiant.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: End Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the person who held the given title during the tenure.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Person

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the start date of the tenure of the religious officiant.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Start Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the title held by the given person during the tenure.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Title

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A religious organization in which members live apart from society and practice their religious devotions.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Order

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religious order to a monastery that is owned or operated by the religious order.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Monastery

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all religious organizations. These include organizations affiliated with, founded by, supported by, etc. a particular religion, as long as the religion in some way strongly influences the religious organization. Religious organizations also include denominations of religions, e.g. the Catholic, Methodist, and Baptist denominations of Christianity.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property linking a religious organization to an address for the organization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Address

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking a religious organization to its corresponding religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Associated with

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property linking a religious organization to a structure owned or used by the organization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Building

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking a religious organization to a parent religious organization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Is Member of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that links a religious organization to the religious jurisdiction that it operates or defines.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Jurisdictions

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property linking a religious organization to a child religious organization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Member Organizations

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that links a religious organization to information about the leadership of the organization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Leaders

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A relationship type that collects information about the tenure of religious leaders.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Organization Leadership

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the person who appointed the leader to the given role.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Appointer

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A date that specifies when the tenure of the religious leader ended.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: End Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the jurisdiction of the religious leader.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Jurisdiction

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the religious leader.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Leader

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property that specifies the religious organization of the leader.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Organization

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the location where the leader was appointed to the given role.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Place of Appointment

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the religious leader who preceded the given leader's tenure.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Predecessor

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the religious leader's title in the given leadership tenure.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Role

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A date that specifies when the tenure of the religious leader began.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Start Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A property that specifies the religious leader who succeeded the given leader's tenure.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Successor

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing standard descriptors of rituals or actions regularly performed by adherents of the religion, e.g. prayer, meditation, ritual purification, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Practice

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking a standard descriptor of a religious practice to a religion that makes use of the practice.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Practice of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing the core texts or collections of texts associated with religions, e.g. the Bible, the Qur'an, the Analects of Confucius, etc.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Text

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking a religious text to a religion for which it is a sacred text.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religious Text of

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Primary entity representing the collection of all saints. Saints are the people who have died and been declared a saint by process of canonization.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Saint

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.saint to the person who formally canonized the saint.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Canonized By

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.saint to the date the saint was canonized, the official process of declaring a deceased person a saint.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Canonized

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.saint to the saint's mso:time.feast_day.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Feast Day

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.saint to the text description of the saint's attributed miracles.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Miracles

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.saint to the text description of the saint's patronage. Patronage means the saint is believed to be the heavenly advocate of a nation, place, craft, activity, class, clan, family, or person.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Patronage

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.saint to the saint's known relics.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Relic

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.saint to the description of the saint's symbolism.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Symbols

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.saint to the mso:religion.religion that venerates this saint.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Venerated In

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Property relating an mso:religion.saint to the date the saint was venerated, the date that the person received a proclamation of the Servant of God's heroic virtue from the Pope.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Veneration Date

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: An individual who claims to have supernatural powers that enable him or her to read the future or receive messages from unseen beings.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Spiritualist

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: Type representing the collection of all synagogues, which are the Jewish houses of prayer.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Synagogue

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A type containing standard descriptors for the type of buildings used by religions as places of worship, e.g. basilica or shrine.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Type of Place of Worship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property linking a type of place of worship with an instance of the type.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Places of Worship

rdf:Description.mso:type.object.description: A virtual property relating a type of place of worship with a corresponding religion.
rdf:Description.mso:type.object.name: Religion
